      • addBackNavigationListener

        public void addBackNavigationListener​(BackNavigationListener listener)
        Description copied from interface: App

        On some devices a back navigation is possible using some kind of back button. When adding a BackNavigationListener the listener will be notified when the user presses the back button.

        Specified by:

      • startInactivityTimer

        public void startInactivityTimer​(int inactivityTime)
        Description copied from interface: App

        With the App.addEventListener(EventType, AppListener) method you can register a listener for the EventType.INACTIVE. Inactive means a period with no user interactions. The App.startInactivityTimer(int) specifies the time that will be used to detect inactivity and starts the inactivity countdown.

        Specified by:
        startInactivityTimer in interface App
        Parameters:
        inactivityTime - the inactivity time in ms.

      • stopInactivityTimer

        public void stopInactivityTimer()
        Description copied from interface: App

        Stops the inactivity countdown.

        Specified by:
        stopInactivityTimer in interface App

      • setScreenProtection

        public void setScreenProtection​(boolean protect)
        Description copied from interface: App

        Instructs the client to enable or disable screen protection. Each client can interpret screen protection differently e.g. showing a black screen.

        Specified by:
        setScreenProtection in interface App

      • hasScreenProtection

        public boolean hasScreenProtection()
        Description copied from interface: App

        Returns whether the screen is protected or not.

        Specified by:
        hasScreenProtection in interface App

      • setBadgeNumber

        public void setBadgeNumber​(int badgeNumber)
        Description copied from interface: App

        Instructs the client to set the given number >= 0 as badge on the application icon. Set to {see SWT.NONE} to hide. Not all clients support badges on the application icon.

        Specified by:
        setBadgeNumber in interface App

      • getBadgeNumber

        public int getBadgeNumber()
        Description copied from interface: App

        Returns the number which should be set in the application icon badge.

        Specified by:
        getBadgeNumber in interface App
